The White Crescent Hospital

The story so far

The White Crescent Hospital

White Crescent Hospital is a leading healthcare provider with locations in Kapsabet and a newly opened branch in Ongata Rongai, Nairobi. The hospital is committed to delivering high-quality medical services to the community, offering a wide range of healthcare treatments, from emergency care to specialized services. With state-of-the-art facilities and a team of dedicated professionals, White Crescent Hospital aims to ensure accessible, compassionate, and patient-centered care for all.

Visit Website

Thought Process

The Challenge

The White Crescent Hospital was struggling to effectively reach and engage potential patients through digital channels. While they have a presence on social media and a website, they face difficulties in attracting new patients, especially in a competitive healthcare market. Additionally, their patient retention rates were not as high as desired, and they lacked an integrated, cohesive digital marketing strategy until they contacted JemsaMediaTech Digital.

The Solution

To address the challenges faced by White Crescent Hospital, JemsaMediaTech Digital designed a comprehensive, integrated strategy aimed at boosting their online presence and patient engagement. We helped White Crescent Hospital redefine its brand messaging to clearly communicate its value proposition.

The Results

Increased Brand Recognition

Instagram and Facebook followers increased by 20% and 30% in 3 months respectively.

Improved Social Media Engagement

Content shared boosted interaction; indicated by an increase in likes, comments, shares, and follows.

Growth in Online Reviews and Ratings

Increase in positive reviews from satisfied patients, who chose #DensmileDentalClinic

Growth in Online Reviews and Ratings

Increase in positive reviews from satisfied patients, who chose #DensmileDentalClinic
